title: Crossword Puzzle Answers
html:
Crossword Puzzle Answers

Across

1. CHAP(T)ER ONE.
6. B-EEF (FEE) rev.).
10. SH(ALL)OW.
11. C-ON TOUR.
12. BO-UNTIES.
13. LYRIC (hidden).
15. E(ME)ND.
16. E-PIG-RAPHS (PHRASE anag.).
18. HO(THOU)SES.
21. SEPA-L(APES rev.).
23. REED-S (DEER rev.).
24. GOLD MINE (anag.).
26. OR(BIT)E-R.
27. TOPSIDE (anag.).
28. TEEM (rev.).
29. CHA(RIOT)EER

Down

1. CASH (homophone).
2. A LA MO-DE (ED. rev.).
3. TALONED (hidden).
4. ROW(DINES)S.
5. NICKS (homophone).
7. E-GO T-RIP.
8. FORECASTE-LE.
9. ANG(L)ER.
14. NE(THERMOS)T (MOTHERS anag.).
17. INSULATOR (anag.).
19. TRE(M)BLE.
20. ONSETS (anag.).
21. SEMIPRO (anag.).
22. PENS-I'VE.
24. GIRTH (anag.).
25. HEIR (homophone).
